data.title: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell Essentials
data.meta_description: Check the minimal and recommended system requirements for Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell Essentials on Ensigame. Find out if your PC can run Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell Essentials and learn about the necessary hardware specifications
data.text:
Minimum Requirements

Operating System: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10

Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3.0 GHz or AMD Athlon 3000+

RAM: 1 GB

Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce 6600 or ATI Radeon X1300

DirectX: Version 9.0c

Storage: 4 GB available space

Recommended Requirements

Operating System: Windows 7 / 8 / 10

Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Athlon 64 X2 4800+

RAM: 2 GB

Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT or ATI Radeon HD 2600 XT

DirectX: Version 9.0c

Storage: 4 GB available space
